name: Chocolate Zucchini Cake
ingredients: 1/2 cups buttermilk (1 Tbsp lemon juice and milk if you donâ€™t have buttermilk)
instructions: Cream butter and oil with sugar.
Add flour, cocoa, soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon and cloves.
Add the nuts and zucchini, blending well.
Top with 1/2 c. chocolate chips and 1/2 c. nuts.
Bake at 325 for 40-45 minutes or until done.
